applicationDescription: This application will set voice reminders
voiceReminderThanks: Thanks, we have saved your voice reminder and date. We will remind you on this date
voiceReminderSentence: Hi. You are using Catapult Voice Reminders to enter a voice reminder please start recording your voice after the beep. Once you are done please press pound.
voiceReminderError: Something went wrong with the call please try again later..
voiceReminderSpeechThanks: Thank you we have saved your reminder. Please take a moment and describe your reminder
voiceReminderMonthError: Error the month was invalid. Try again.
voiceReminderYearError: Error the year was invalid. Try again
voiceReminderDateError: Error the date was invalid. Try again
voiceReminderDate: Please enter a two digit date for this reminder
voiceReminderMonth: Please enter a two digit month for this reminder
voiceReminderYear: Please enter a four digit year for this reminder
